mapper.select: Select artist, title from music where artist like CONCAT('%', #{Artist}, '%') and title like CONCAT('%', #{title}, '%') LIMIT 1;

SELECT COUNT(playlist_ID) AS dupl, playlist_ID, title, artist FROM rel, music GROUP BY music_ID, ID HAVING music_ID = ID and playlist_ID IN ( SELECT A.ID FROM playlist A, playlist B, rel, music WHERE A.user_ID IN (B.user_ID) AND B.ID = rel.playlist_ID AND music.ID = rel.music_ID AND music.videoid LIKE CONCAT('%', #{video_ID}, '%')) ORDER BY dupl DESC LIMIT 12;

SELECT count(playlist_ID) AS dupl, playlist_ID, artist, title FROM rel, music GROUP BY music_ID, ID HAVING music_ID = ID and playlist_ID IN ( SELECT playlist_ID FROM rel, music WHERE rel.music_ID = music.ID AND videoid like CONCAT('%', #{video_ID}, '%')) ORDER BY dupl desc LIMIT 12;
